name: OrbitB-Hyve
0:
”Alexa, ask B-Hyve to set a rain delay.”
”Alexa, ask B-Hyve to water the lawn.”
”Alexa, ask B-Hyve to water zone 3 for 10 minutes.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beehive
Developer Terms of Use
des: With the B-Hyve skill, you can use your voice to control your Orbit B-Hyve sprinkler timer. You can change your timer mode, start or stop watering, start or stop a rain delay, and more! Before you get started, be sure you own an Orbit B-Hyve sprinkler timer and have an account on our app for iPhone or Android. For help, please visit http://help.orbitbhyve.com/.
